Interface DigestCreator<DIGEST extends Digest>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MDDigestCreator, SHADigestCreator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDigestCreator, AbstractMDDigestCreator, AbstractSHADigestCreator, MDBasicDigestCreator, SHABasicDigestCreator

    public interface DigestCreator<DIGEST extends Digest>
    A DigestCreator can create an XDI Digest.
